attributes.action: The government must take a serious look  at the misbehaviour by senior staff at the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
Please consider setting up a Royal Commission to investigate  what has gone wrong  at the BBC  over the past 30 years.

The  TV Licence  is now regarded by many people  as an unjust  tax, and that  it gives the BBC  a licence to behave badly.

The BBC should be renamed  as   "Men behaving Badly"
